3. Edsvikens Piazza & Gelateria Norr M√§larstrand

Sometimes you might feel Stockholm is literally an island, where you can feel bit isolated or lonely for somehow. During this Summer, right after I had finished with my Master's thesis, I felt a bit bored of doing nothing and lost like as a person who has nowhere to go. One Summer day, I met my previous colleague at this ice-cream store and had a talk about random topics‚òÄÔ∏è And I felt very much revived after having ice-cream with her at this place. Taste of the ice-cream is a bit light in a very good way, not too sugary, but lagom sweetness which can refresh you from warm and boring Summer. This place is not so much far away from Stockholm city hall so that you can pass by beautiful architecture on the way as well üö∂‚Äç
